text: publication of a facsimile in all states of australia and the australian capital territory by a company conveying defamatory innuendos about persons associated with a competitor business
publication of a 'whistleblower' letter to the australian taxation office

publication of an email to two officers of the principal supplier of the competitor business located in the special administrative region of hong kong and in another location within the people's republic of china
availability of presumption as to the law, if any, in respect of defamation in the special administrative region of hong kong and elsewhere in the people's republic of china
compensatory, aggravated and exemplary damages  trade practices
claims for defamation run in parallel with claims for representations said to constitute misleading and deceptive conduct
discretion to limit the use to be made of evidence following its admission where an order has been made excusing a witness under cross-examination from giving further evidence in the case
